message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. This seems fair to me considering the money loses value over time.
I think we can do better than that! Considering the inflation, I believe this is a more reasonable split.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a slightly smaller share - $55 to your $45.  Every round counts with this inflation!
Come on, Alice! The inflation is hitting you harder than me. I think I deserve a bigger share now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit on my share, but we need to close this deal soon!  $52 for me, $48 for you.
I know the inflation is killing us both, but I think I can hold out longer. This is my best offer so far.
